LanguageData.MeleeDPS.label: melee DPS
LanguageData.MeleeDPS.description: Average damage per second in melee combat.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.label: shooting accuracy
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.description: Base chance to not miss per square of shot distance.
LanguageData.AimingDelayFactor.label: aiming time
LanguageData.AimingDelayFactor.description: How long it takes to strike after aiming.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChance.label: melee hit chance
LanguageData.MeleeHitChance.description: Base chance to hit a target in melee.
